Course Outline.heading: Introduction to R
list: Introduction to R – History, Windows of  R, Application, Why R?, compared with other software.
Data Structures in R – Vector, List, Matrix & Data Frame.
Packages in R – What is Package, How to install package, How to use?
First steps with a dataset – head, tail, summary, class, list, ls()
Discussion of case study and understand optimal way of writing code.

Course Outline.heading: Data Manipulation in R
list: Dplyr package- Select, Filter, mutate, summarize etc.,

Course Outline.heading: Visualization in R
list: Plotting with base grapg – Histogram, Scatter, Boxplot, Bargraph, line graph etc.
Plotting with ggplot2 – Histogram, Scatter, Boxplot, Bargraph, line graph etc.

Course Outline.heading: Descriptive Statistics
list: Measure of central Tendency – Mean, Median and Mode
Measure of dispersion –Range, variance, SD and CV
Measure of Shape – Skewness and Kurtosis

Course Outline.heading: Testing of Hypothesis
list: Parametric and Non parametric test (T Test, Z test, Paired T test, ANOVA and Chi square test)

Course Outline.heading: Correlation And Regression
list: Variable selection Technique – Forward, Backward and Stepwise Regression

sublist: Hierarchical cluster : Linkage, centroid and Wards methods
How to decide number of factors
